title: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A T355Y 2 GB RAM 16 GB ROM 8 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Sandy White)

product_specification.Covered in Warranty: 1 Year manufacturer warranty for the Tablet, 6 months manufacturer warranty for other inbox accessories

product_description.Sleek and Lightweight: This Samsung Galaxy Tab features an eye-catching design and is just 7.5 mm thick and weighs 320 g which offers unbeatable portability and a secure grip.
product_description.Optimal Viewing Experience: With this sleek and stylish tablet, you can take your multimedia experience to the next level. Its 4:3 aspect ratio screen allows you to read books, magazines, and newspapers in a clarity that's a treat for your eyes.
product_description.Better Photos: Bring out the hidden photographer in you with this tablet. Featuring a 5 MP rear camera and an autofocus feature, you can capture beautiful moments in the form of pictures and videos. With its continuous shot feature, you can capture multiple images by holding the camera button.
product_description.Powerful Performance: Powered by a 1.2 GHz Quad Core processor and 2 GB RAM, this Android tablet delivers powerful performance and allows you to access a variety of multimedia content seamlessly.
product_description.Fun for the Kids: This tab is equipped with children-friendly apps that not only educate your kids but they also entertain them.
product_description.Seamless Connection: You can also connect this 4G tablet with a Samsung Smart TV and watch videos, view photos and more.

review:
Hi one and all
I hope this is the best tablet under budget.
Before buying this tablet I thought about phablet like lenovo , MI MAX even MI MIX) but after bought my assumption is Phablet is never be tablet.
Calling facility 5*
Handling Phone simply superb
Performance excellent
Internet and videos simply soft
Sound quality good
All the specification are very good and working well.
I'm not a gamer so I don't think memory and internal storage is quite good.all things are very good except camera(flash be useful for low light time).
A BIG thanks to Flipkart and its team, to satisfy its customers all the while.

In Feb-2016 I purchased this tablet from Reliance Digital. . After 6 months, battery deteriorated. It use to drain very fast. Since within warranty Samsung Service Centre replaced it and now it lasts upto 3 days. I use the tablet almost everyday. I am very much satisfied with its performance. Following are my observations:

Display - Very good
Battery life - Now Excellent
Performance - Excellent
Both Cameras - Average
Updates received upto - Android 6.0.1
4G/LTE - Yes , Jio Sim works only for data, for jio caĺing/sms relevent jio apps are reqd

Instead of using a android Smartphone , I feel it is more convenient to use tablet like this one becoz of its large screen and superb performance.

Have this tab for 2 days. happy with it. went for this tab only due to the screen's aspect ratio which is 4:3, looks big. battery drains fast i mean with full charge it would only last for 12 hrs with reading and video watching, have not tried games yet. but iam sure it wont last 12 hrs if one played games.though it isexpelled from the really gud for reading and watching videos. my 2yr old loves it. please dont expect really big out of this tab, go for 20k plus tabs if want better performance. i dont really trust lenovo so i didnt purchase it, otherwise specwise lenovo tab4 8 and tab4 8 plus may be gud. again these may have issues with battery and other h/w later. again i may b wrong with my predictions. so choise is your's. best of luck.

This is one of the good tablet out there at sub 20k segment..I got it at 15.5k..Although it is not the best tablet I have seen however it is perfect for daily usage for any normal users(If you are not an Ipad freak/geek)..

Product Review:.
Pros:
1.Samsung Ui.. it received android nougat 7.1 update within 3-4 hrs of purchase.. It is snappy & with multiple uses with split screen, night reading etc.
2.Sound quality is good.
3.battery is moderately good. Runs for a day easily with 7-8 hrs screen time.
4.Design-Sleek and gives a nice feeling on hand.
5.Overall experience -Samsung never disappoints in this segment. it is user friendly. easy to use. less bugs... smooth ui.. best budget friendly tab for me.. (Tab A 2017 is slightly bttr but it costs 2.4k more).
6.Connectivity (wifi+mobile data) is good.

Cons:
1.Display is good. not the best.It is just ok.
2.charging time is 2.5-3.5 hrs. So buy a good charger 1st.
3.Internal memory(roughly 9gb available). this is a common problem for most tabs.. Buy a 32/64gb memory card.

Verdict :If you are looking for an android tablet at sub 20k segment go for this one. If you can spend 21-22k go for ipad instead..

thanks

Well, i was looking for atleast 3GB RAM version but i could only find this one for 16500 budget with 2GB RAM. I was not confident about the speed but i see that its pretty fast and works well with multi tasking.
There is definitely a bit of LAG if you are an extensive user but if you are a moderate user then this is definitely a good product for you.

As usual FLIPKART was very fast in delivering and professional with their part.

This tab I used for a very short time with Jio SIM. It worked fine both for calling, whatsapp, browsing and email. In July I changed the SIM to another Jio SIM.
The problem started from the same moment. The 'Call ended' problem persists till this moment. I took it to local Samsung care. He couldn't set it right. Twice I reset it to factory reset. Several times I reset it to default. I did all that I could to take help from online resources. But to no use. It's now lying useless. Rs.14999 are gone to guttur.
I don't know whether the mistake is with the tablet or with the Jim network. But the same Jim SIM works so well in other phones.
It's internet features are working perfectly. I don't know how such products are sold by flipkart. I wonder what products are manufactured by Samsung Mobiles.
I advise other buyers to not buy it lest they suffer like me.

Honestly I bought it for the study purpose only. Screen ratio 4:3 is superb, good for study. I charge it rarely, means good battery backup, if you are using it for study purpose. Don't look for the camera performance, it's tab. Happy with the ram management. Screen resolution could be better.

The product has all essential features and the specs can be reviewed on flipkart.
My purpose of tab is for skype calling and having entertainment on the go.
The touch is soft and sensitive.The best part of this tab is its shape and size, especially rhe rounded edges. The OS is perfectly working without and lag on having multiple apps on.
The camera quality is good especially front cam.The only feature missing is flash.
The best part of tab is 4G that makes our life easy while in transit.

Pros:
Good Display quality
Battery backup lasts 14-18 hrs(Wifi) and 12-14 Hrs (4g) medium usage
charging time is 3 hrs from 0 to 100%
camera is decent for low light indoor photos bt worst at night time
skype and other video calling apps works perfectly well
Can be connected to samsung smart tvs via wifi this is best part for the tab
Multi window works perfectly

Cons:
Flash missing
Have loud speaker on bottom of tab and dat is inconvenient in some cases

Hope you all find my review helpfull
